715850f-a.text:

715853f-a.text:

August 31, 1928.

710856f-b.text:
(1)
East 3rd Street, west from and including Ave. A. The view shows construction in progress for the new Astor houses; a slum clearance project, on the south side of the street.
April 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a different angle, and showing a closer view of demolition.
April 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
